# OpenLink

> Link previews from any URL. Zero dependencies, edge-native, under 5kb.

OpenLink is a modern link preview library built for the edge. Extract Open Graph metadata, favicons, oEmbed data, and rich previews from any URL.

## Documentation

- [Introduction](/docs): Overview and quick example
- [Installation](/docs/installation): Install via npm, pnpm, yarn, or bun
- [Quick Start](/docs/quickstart): Get up and running in under a minute
- [API Reference](/docs/api): Complete reference for preview, parse, extract functions
- [Preview API](/docs/preview): Hosted API endpoint reference
- [Favicon API](/docs/favicon): Extract favicons from any domain
- [oEmbed](/docs/oembed): Extract embeds from YouTube, Twitter, Spotify, etc.
- [TypeScript](/docs/typescript): Full type definitions and interfaces
- [Edge Runtimes](/docs/edge): Deploy on Cloudflare Workers, Vercel Edge, Deno, Bun
- [AI Tools](/docs/ai): Use openlink as a tool for LLMs and AI agents
- [Caching](/docs/caching): Stale-while-revalidate and TTL configuration
- [Errors](/docs/errors): Error codes and handling

## Quick Example

```typescript
import { preview } from "openlink"

const data = await preview("https://github.com")
console.log(data.title) // "GitHub"
```

## Hosted API

```bash
curl "https://openlink.sh/api/preview?url=https://github.com"
```

## Features

- Zero dependencies
- Edge native (Cloudflare Workers, Vercel Edge, Deno, Bun)
- TypeScript with full type safety
- Under 5kb gzipped
- oEmbed support (YouTube, Twitter, Spotify, Vimeo, TikTok, etc.)
- Smart caching with stale-while-revalidate
- AI/LLM tool compatible

## Links

- Website: https://openlink.sh
- GitHub: https://github.com/visible/openlink
- npm: https://npmjs.com/package/openlink
